column4: I am getting crazy with this bug... Whenever I press the "Log off, switch user [...]" button, my X crashes... I can't interact with anything... So I must restart X with Ctrl + Alt + Backspace... Any tips? Anyone experiencing the same problem?
see if there are any useful messages in the X log (/var/log/Xorg.0.log)
The file is very long, but there are no (EE) marks...
